post.summary: Login a user with username/email and password.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Related objects to include in the response. See the description of return value for more details.

schema.description:
O corpo de resposta contém propriedades do AccessToken criado no login.
Dependendo do valor do parâmetro `include`, o corpo poderá conter propriedades adicionais:

  - `user` - `U+007BUserU+007D` - Dados do usuário com login efetuado atualmente. (`include=user`)

post.summary: Logout a user with access token.
Trigger user's identity verification with configured verifyOptions

Change a user's password.
Reset user's password via a password-reset token.
